resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>77436</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>4b72840f-ec30-11d7-8380-000acd021b2b#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Az első világháború katonái a lövészárokban</string>
            <string language="en">The soilders of the First World War are in the trench</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die soilders des ersten Weltkrieges sind- im 
Graben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les soilders de la première guerre mondiale sont
dans le fossé</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os soilders da primeira guerra de mundo estão na 
trincheira</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I soilders della prima guerra mondiale sono nella
trincea</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα soilders του πρώτου παγκόσμιου πολέμου είναι 
στην τάφρο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los soilders de la primera guerra mundial están 
en el foso</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A katonák idejük nagy részét a lövészárokban töltötték</string>
            <string language="en">The soilders spent most of their time in the trench</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">állóháború,  harc,  front,  </string>
            <string language="en">trench warfare, fight, front line</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die soilders verbrachten die meisten ihrer Zeit im
Graben</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les soilders ont passé la majeure partie de leur
temps dans le fossé</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os soilders gastaram a maioria de seu tempo na 
trincheira</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I soilders hanno speso la maggior 
parte del loro tempo nella trincea</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα soilders που ξοδεύονται τον μεγαλύτερο μέρος του 
χρόνου τους στην τάφρο</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los soilders pasaron la mayoría de su tiempo en 
el foso</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grabenkriegsführung, Kampf, vordere Zeile</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">guerre de fossé, combat, ligne de front</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">guerra da trincheira, luta, linha dianteira</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">guerra della trincea, lotta, riga anteriore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εχθροπραξία τάφρων, πάλη, πρώτη γραμμή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">guerra del foso, lucha, línea delantera</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>

            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>

          </cost>

          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>

            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:Panem Kiadó
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>

            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>590</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>

        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
